snippet: The president acknowledged before a star-studded fund-raiser on Sunday night that he may have flubbed the face-to-face standoff with Mitt Romney last week.
abstract: The president acknowledged before a star-studded fund-raiser on Sunday night that he may have flubbed the face-to-face standoff with Mitt Romney last week.

headline.main: On Fund-Raising Tour, Obama Admits Poor Debate Showing
